questions.question: What is the predominant color of the shoe's upper?
What is the color of the accent stripe along the sole and heel?
What is the apparent material of the shoe's main body?
What is the overall style of the shoe; slip-on or laced?
Describe the texture of the upper material; smooth or patterned?
What color is the visible interior lining of the shoe?
What is the shape of the shoe's toe area; rounded or pointed?
Is the sole of the shoe thick or thin in visual appearance?
What design element is present near the heel of the shoe?
What is the general condition of the visible shoe; new or worn?
What is the color of the visible stitching along the shoe?
Does the sole show a visible pattern or texture?
Does the shoe appear to have any visible perforations?
Is the heel area of the shoe reinforced or cushioned?
What type of closure mechanism does the shoe feature?
